notice.ch: 重修大一體育請至體育室教學組拿密碼卡

remark.ch: 重修大一體育請至體育室教學組拿密碼卡

goal.ch:
一、鍛鍊身體，使體格與體能得以充分發展。
二、提高運動技能，增進身體使用效率及安全自衛能力。
三、增進運動與保健知識，培養自我健身及鍛鍊體能之能力。
goal.en:
1. Exercise the body so that the physique and physical fitness can 
be fully developed.
2. Improve sports skills, improve body use efficiency and safety and self-defense capabilities.
3. Improve the knowledge of sports and health care, and cultivate 
the ability of self-fit and physical exercise.

outline.ch:
一、走跑運動：短距離的基本特質及動作。
二、伸興趣選項課程介紹及球類運動 。
三、運動傷害處理與急救：1.運動傷害處理原則(PRICE)；2.常見傷害處置。
四、墊上運動：1.簡介  2.基本墊上活動  3.主要活動：滾翻,平衡  4.加強柔軟度協調感及靈敏性。
五、間歇訓練：1.沿革 2.理論基礎  3.相關術語  4.處方編排  5.範例應用 。
六、藥球補強：1.立姿背對背轉身傳球  2.  立姿背對背前彎與過頭傳球  3.坐姿仰臥起坐
傳球  4.坐姿向前向後高拋傳球  5.站姿正面高拋傳球    6.站立背向高拋傳球。
七、循環訓練：1.介紹  2.訓練計劃與管理。
八、跳部運動：1.跳遠及三級跳遠特性 2.跳遠及三級跳遠技術 3.動作要領及注意事項。
九、男生立定三級跳、女生立定三次跳及一百公尺測驗。
十、游泳：1.蛙式腿部動作講解：收腿→翻足→蹬夾水→伸直；2.陸上練習：坐姿、俯
姿、單腳練習；3.水中練習：扶池壁練習、持浮板練習腿部動作。
十一、1.蛙式腿部動作水中練習：漂浮練習腿部動作、蹬池壁練習腿部動作。 2.手臂動作講解：划→收、伸。
十二、游泳：1.手臂動作陸上練習：身體直立、身體前傾；2.水中練習：原地練習、水中
行走練習、漂浮練習。
十三、游泳：1.蛙式手腳聯合動作講解：水中練習；2.蛙式換氣動作講解：水中原地練
習、水中行走練習。
十四、游泳：1.蛙式手腳聯合動作水中練習；2.蛙式換氣動作水中原地練習、水中行走練
習。
十五、游泳：1.蛙式腳部、手部、聯合動作複習；2.蛙式完整動作講解：伸直身體→收腿
→收手→抬頭換氣→伸直身體。
十六、術科測驗、常識測驗（筆試） 。
十七、教師彈性補充教學、補考。
十八、教師彈性補充教學、補考。
outline.en:
1. Walking and running: basic characteristics and movements of short distances.
2. Introduction to optional courses for extending interests and ball games.
3. Sports injury treatment and first aid: 1. Sports injury treatment principles (PRICE); 2. Treatment of common injuries.
4. Mat exercises: 1. Introduction 2. Basic mat activities 3. Main activities: tumbling, balancing 4. Enhance softness, coordination and sensitivity.
5. Interval training: 1. History 2. Theoretical basis 3. Related terms 4. Prescription arrangement 5. Example application.
6. Medicine ball reinforcement: 1. Standing back-to-back turning pass 2. Standing back-to-back forward bend and overhead pass 3. Seated sit-ups
Passing 4. Sitting forward and backward high throwing pass 5. Standing front high throwing pass 6. Standing back high throwing pass.
7. Circuit training: 1. Introduction 2. Training plan and management.
8. Jump sports: 1. Long jump and triple jump characteristics 2. Long jump and triple jump techniques 3. Action essentials and precautions.
9. Boys‘ standing triple jump, girls‘ standing triple jump and 100-meter test.
10. Swimming: 1. Explanation of frog leg movements: draw legs → turn over feet → push into the water → straighten; 2. Land exercises: sitting, leaning
posture and single-leg exercises; 3. Exercises in water: practice holding on to the pool wall and practicing leg movements while holding a floating board.
11. 1. Frog-style leg movements in water exercises: practice leg movements by floating, practice leg movements by pushing on the wall of the pool. 2. Explanation of arm movements: row → retract, extend.
12. Swimming: 1. Arm movement land exercises: body upright, body leaning forward; 2. Water exercises: in situ exercises, in water
Walking exercises, floating exercises.
13. Swimming: 1. Explanation of the joint movements of the frog hands and feet: practice in the water; 2. Explanation of the lunge breathing movement: practice in place in the water
Practice and practice walking in water.
14. Swimming: 1. In-water practice of frog-like hand and foot joint movements; 2. In-situ practice in water of frog-like breathing movement and walking practice in water
habit.
15. Swimming: 1. Review of breaststroke feet, hands, and joint movements; 2. Explanation of complete breaststroke movements: straighten the body → retract the legs
→Hold your hands →raise your head to breathe →straighten your body.
16. Technical test and general knowledge test (written test).
17. Teachers can provide flexible supplementary teaching and make-up exams.
18. Teachers can provide flexible supplementary teaching and make-up exams.

textbook.ch: 中央大學體育室(1999)。大一體育補充教材。中央大學體育室。
textbook.en:
Central University Office of Physical Education (1999). Freshman 
Physical Education Supplementary Textbook.Office of Physical 
Education, National Central University

instructMethod.ch:
講授


個別指導
其他

gradMethod.ch:
一、體育常識測驗：20％ 
二、出席勤惰及學習精神：20％
三、術科測驗：60％
gradMethod.en:
1. Sports general knowledge test: 20％
2. Attendance, diligence and learning spirit: 20％
3. Skill test: 60％

flexDiscription.ch:
十七、教師彈性補充教學、補考。
十八、教師彈性補充教學、補考。
flexDiscription.en:
Week 17. Teachers can provide flexible supplementary teaching and make-up exams.
Week 18. Teachers can provide flexible supplementary teaching and make-up exams.
